name: Save the Alan
description:
Summary: In this game, you will need to defeat enemies to save the alan!

Gameplay: You must evade the chickens and eggs in order to get to the final level and save the alan.

Mechanics: Use WADS or arrow keys to move the player, left click to shoot and r to reload.

Story: The king alan has been captured, go save him.

Levels: 3 levels to get through to get to the final stage where you can save the alan.

User Interface: buttons to restart during the game, and buttons to choose the level in the beginning

AI: There are chickens that spawn eggs. The eggs are killable and will follow the player.

Game Art/Audio: Pixel art, with chinese music.
